Class Vehicle

    • WorldObjects.Vehicle

implements Movable

        Parameters:
        color - the color the vehicle is supposed to have
        enginePower - the enginepower the car is supposed to have
        modelname - the model of the car
        picsize - the size of the picture (if (null) size = 70x50)
